quotes.quote: You are confident in all that you do.
Life isn't a dress rehearsal. This is your moment to shine like the star you are.
Trade self-doubt for self-confidence.
I want you to believe in yourself, and take chances, even if it is scary, and even if you don't know what you are doing yet.
Faith moves mountains! Believe in yourself, and amazing things will result.
There is absolutely nothing you can't conquer. Your courage, inner strength, and determination are amazing.
Know your worth and believe in it.
Respect yourself, love yourself, because there has never been a person like you and there never will be again.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Confidence comes from action.
Be proud of how far you've come and never stop pushing to be the best you can be.
Be brave enough to stop worrying about what others think of you.
You were born an original. Don't die a copy.
quotes.author: John Landis Mason

quotes.quote: You don't have to become who they want. Be yourself. The people meant to be with you prefer you that way.
Stop worrying about their opinions. The only person you need to impress is yourself.
Whenever someone tells me I can't, I laugh and do it anyway.
On the days your confidence needs a boost, look at the amazingly Divine being in the mirror. You did this, you're doing this.
Accepting yourself as you are is the way to victory.
You're solid gold, baby. Don't you dare forget it.
Choose what makes you feel good today, what warms you up inside.
There are no limits to your dreams.
No matter what anyone says about you, you must remain grounded in knowing you are special and that you matter.
Always be a first-rate version of yourself and not a second-rate version of someone else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: When you have confidence, you can do anything.
You're not gonna tell me who I am. I'm gonna tell you who I am.
As is our confidence, so is our capacity.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: There will always be people who doubt you. Laugh as you prove them wrong.
Keep believing in yourself.
Don't stress over being yourself. The act of being yourself is simply to be. Be without changing yourself for others. Simply be.
What could we accomplish if we knew we could not fail?
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Confidence comes not from always being right, but from not fearing to be wrong.
Acknowledge and respect your worth, and refuse to accept anything less.
Better keep yourself clean and bright; you are the window through which you must see the world.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Self-love begins when you realize that you, too, deserve to be happy.
The biggest human temptation is to settle for too little.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Unconditional self-love doesn't mean you don't see your flaws. It means you love yourself anyways.
You are strong. You are beautiful. You are enough.
The best thing is to realize that you are who you are and you gotta work with what you got.
quotes.author: Zendaya

quotes.quote: You deserve to be loved, fully and completely, by yourself.
You are worthy. You are so worthy.
